subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson said Tuesday that he was unfazed by Tyson Chandler’s pointed remarks about the Knicks’ defensive schemes after a blowout loss to the Nets on Monday.
snippet: Coach Mike Woodson said Tuesday that he was unfazed by Tyson Chandler’s pointed remarks about the Knicks’ defensive schemes after a blowout loss to the Nets on Monday.
